properties.areaDesc: Clayton, GA; Fayette, GA; Spalding, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 6:01PM EST until February 7 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Chattahoochee River near Whitesburg affecting Carroll...Coweta and
Heard Counties

Flint River near Lovejoy affecting Clayton...Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Flint River near Molena affecting Meriwether and Pike Counties

Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Crawford...
Talbot...Taylor and Upson Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Flint River near Lovejoy.
* From this evening until Friday evening.
* At 515 PM Thursday the stage was 10.1 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 12 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage tonight, then
continue rising, reaching near 13.2 feet by Friday morning.
The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday afternoon.
* At 9 feet, bankfull Stage is reached with high water spreading out
into the flood plain.

At 12 feet, minor flooding occurs. Flooding of Rivers Edge Golf
Course begins with several holes and fairways flooded. Flooding of
some yards begins upstream of gage between Upper Riverdale Road and
Highway 138.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
